results.content: Videos were instructive, learned what I expected to learn. Only comment is the voice of the narrator is a little monotonous, but otherwise very good.
results.content_html: Videos were instructive, learned what I expected to learn. Only comment is the voice of the narrator is a little monotonous, but otherwise very good.

results.content: The course only described the what but didn’t get into the why or how. It describes what tags and elements and attributes are, but doesn’t ever mention how to use them in the context of a document or why they’re used. This was essentially a course on terminology.
results.content_html: The course only described the what but didn’t get into the why or how. It describes what tags and elements and attributes are, but doesn’t ever mention how to use them in the context of a document or why they’re used. This was essentially a course on terminology.

results.content: Der Kurs selbst war für mich als blutigen Einsteiger sehr gut geeignet, um XML etwas kennenzulernen. Ich habe Lust, tiefer in das Thema einzusteigen.  Mich hat aber sehr stark gestört, dass die Untertitel anscheinend maschinell generiert wurden und dabei die Aussprache des Erzählers nicht erkannt wurde, es stand teilweise abstruser Text dort, der ganz und gar nicht mit dem Gesagten übereingestimmt hat.
results.content_html: Der Kurs selbst war für mich als blutigen Einsteiger sehr gut geeignet, um XML etwas kennenzulernen. Ich habe Lust, tiefer in das Thema einzusteigen. Mich hat aber sehr stark gestört, dass die Untertitel anscheinend maschinell generiert wurden und dabei die Aussprache des Erzählers nicht erkannt wurde, es stand teilweise abstruser Text dort, der ganz und gar nicht mit dem Gesagten übereingestimmt hat.

results.content: A very good course, very informative for a beginner who has no previous experience with XML. Just a small remark: when you were presenting the Cars elements, you said that both elements have to be written in the same manner, but in the video there was an empty tag where the element in one tag was named as <car-color>, but in the closing bracket the name of the element was </Car-color>. So you should probably edit that, could be confusing, especially when you hear in the next video that that would be a problem when applying the code. Otherwise no remarks :)
results.content_html: A very good course, very informative for a beginner who has no previous experience with XML. Just a small remark: when you were presenting the Cars elements, you said that both elements have to be written in the same manner, but in the video there was an empty tag where the element in one tag was named as , but in the closing bracket the name of the element was . So you should probably edit that, could be confusing, especially when you hear in the next video that that would be a problem when applying the code. Otherwise no remarks :)
